word_mean: 反射：物理学上，指光线、声音、热能冲撞一个不能穿入的表面时的折回现象，反折之前的射线称为入射线，反折之后的射线称为反射线

sentence.Network_en: On reflection, he says, he very much regrets the comments.
sentence.Network_cn: 经过反省，他说自己对所作的评论感到非常后悔。

sentence.Network_en: I couldn't bear to see my reflection in the mirror.
sentence.Network_cn: 我不忍看镜子里自己的样子。

sentence.Network_en: After days of reflection she decided to write back.
sentence.Network_cn: 想了几天之后她决定回信。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 反射 (Reflection) 是指在程序在运行时 (run-time) 获取类信息的方式. 诸如实现动态创建类实例, 方法等. 在很语言中都有相关的的实.
教学反思(reflection)是教师以自己的教学活动为思考对象，来对自己所做出的行为、决策以及由此所产生的结果进行审视和研究的过程…

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French reflexion or late Latin reflexio(n-), from Latin reflex- 'bent back', from the verb reflectere

encyclopedia.content: 概述 电影《花木兰》主题曲"Reflection"由Christina Aguilera献唱。歌词大意 Look at me 看着我 You may think you see 你也许认为你看到了 Who I really am 真正的我 But you'll never know me 但你永远都不会了解我 Every day 每一天 It's as if I play a part 我好像都在演戏 Now I see 现在我明白了 If I wear a mask 如果我戴着面具 I can fool the world 我可以欺骗整个世界 But I cannot fool my heart 但我不可

entry.def: A reflection is an image that you can see in a mirror or in glass or water.

example.ex: Meg stared at her reflection in the bedroom mirror.
example.tran: 梅格注视着卧室中镜子里的自己。

entry.def: Reflection is the process by which light and heat are sent back from a surface and do not pass through it.

example.ex: ...the reflection of a beam of light off a mirror.
example.tran: 一束光从镜子表面的反射

entry.def: If you say that something is a reflection of a particular person's attitude or of a situation, you mean that it is caused by that attitude or situation and therefore reveals something about it.

example.ex: Inhibition in adulthood seems to be very clearly a reflection of a person's experiences as a child.
example.tran: 一个人成年期的情感压抑似乎很明显是其童年时期经历的反映。

entry.def: If something is a reflection or a sad reflection on a person or thing, it gives a bad impression of them.

example.ex: Infection with head lice is no reflection on personal hygiene...
example.tran: 头上生虱子并不说明不讲个人卫生。

example.ex: The library is unique and its break-up would be a sad reflection on the value we place on our heritage.
example.tran: 这个图书馆很特别，若将它关闭，会让人怀疑我们是否珍视传统。

entry.def: Reflection is careful thought about a particular subject. Your reflections are your thoughts about a particular subject.

example.ex: After days of reflection she decided to write back...
example.tran: 想了几天之后她决定回信。

example.ex: He paused, absorbed by his reflections.

entry.def: Reflections on something are comments or writings that express someone's ideas about it.

example.ex: In his latest collection of poems readers are confronted with a series of reflections on death.
example.tran: 在他最新的诗集里，读者能够读到他对死亡的一系列感想。

means.word_mean: 2. the phenomenon of a propagating wave (light or sound) being thrown back from a surface

sentences.sentence: "the pulse is a reflection of the heart's condition"

means.word_mean: 4. the image of something as reflected by a mirror (or other reflective material);

sentences.sentence: "he studied his reflection in the mirror"

means.word_mean: 5. a likeness in which left and right are reversed
6. (mathematics) a transformation in which the direction of one axis is reversed
8. the ability to reflect beams or rays

auth_sentence.content: It is a reflection of the dire economic outlook.
auth_sentence.res_content: It is a reflection of the dire economic outlook.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It is a reflection of the dire economic outlook.

auth_sentence.content: This is an important insight that deserves some reflection.
auth_sentence.res_content: This is an important insight that deserves some reflection.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This is an important insight that deserves some reflection.

auth_sentence.content: This is not a fair reflection of the literature.
auth_sentence.res_content: This is not a fair reflection of the literature.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This is not a fair reflection of the literature.

stems_affixes.word_buile: reflect[v.回想;反射]+ive……的→adj.深思熟虑的
deflect[v.[使]偏斜]+ion表名词→n.偏斜,歪斜;偏差
inflect[v.弯曲, 使屈曲, 改变, [语法]变化词尾或变形]+ion表名词→n.变形;词尾变化
reflect[v.回想;反射]+ion表名词→n.映像,倒影;反省,沉思
de离开+flect弯曲→离开[偏离]弯曲→偏斜

stems_affixes.value_cn: 曲膝半跪[以示敬意],屈从
stems_affixes.word_buile: genu膝盖+flect弯曲→膝盖弯曲→下跪

stems_affixes.value_cn: 弯曲, 使屈曲, 改变, [语法]变化词尾或变形
stems_affixes.word_buile: in使+flect弯曲→使弯曲,引申为单词后面的变化和原来不一样,如child变为children

Sentence.sentence: Both are critical to producing citizens who can participate effectively in our democratic society, become innovative（创新的)leaders, and benefit from the spiritual enrichment that the reflection on the great ideas of mankind over time provides.
It is a reflection of self-esteem.

sentences.en: The reflection of the sun on the glass wall was blinding.
sentences.cn: 玻璃墙上反射的太阳光令人目眩。

sentences.en: This is a reflection of their frailty.

means.word_mean: 深思; 回忆; 考虑; 看法

sentences.en: A moment's reflection will show you are wrong.
sentences.cn: 只要略加考虑就可看出你错了。

jushi.english: The reflection of the sun on the glass wall was blinding.
jushi.chinese: 玻璃墙上反射的太阳光令人目眩。

jushi.english: A moment's reflection will show you are wrong.
jushi.chinese: 只要略加考虑就可看出你错了。

jushi.english: You can see your reflection in a mirror.
jushi.chinese: 你能在镜子里看到自己的映像。
